definition: to run amok (idiom); to commit outrages
surname Hu
non-Han people, esp. from central Asia/reckless/outrageous/what?/why?/to complete a winning hand at mahjong (also written 和[hu2])
beard/mustache/whiskers
see 衚衕|胡同[hu2 tong4]
worker/workshop/(slang) troublesome/high-maintenance (person)
to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works
abbr. for 非洲[Fei1 zhou1], Africa
to not be/not/wrong/incorrect/non-/un-/in-/to reproach or blame/(colloquial) to insist on/simply must
variant of 為|为[wei4], because of/for/to
because of/for/to
variant of 為|为[wei2]/as (i.e. in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do
as (in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do/by (in the passive voice)

sentences.english: The hundred knights were all men of choice behaviour and sobriety of manners .
sentences.chinese: 那一百名武士都是品行端正，绝不胡作非为的。

sentences.english: The congressman launched a strong attack on the president's misconduct.
sentences.chinese: 议员猛烈抨击了总统的胡作非为。

sentences.english: He [She] is not allowed to commit any outrages.
He tried to imprint the number on his memory . He was scourged by the memory of his misdeeds.
sentences.chinese: 他对以往的胡作非为的回忆使得他精神上受到了惩罚。

sentences.english: The hundred knights were all men of choice behaviour and sobriety of manners.
sentences.chinese: 那一百名武士都是品行端正，绝不胡作非为的。

definition: to break the law and commit crimes (idiom); malefactor/evildoer/to perpetrate outrages
see 恣意妄為|恣意妄为[zi4 yi4 wang4 wei2]
to act arbitrarily regardless of the rules/to mess with sth/to make a hash of things/to cause trouble
regardless of the law and of natural morality (idiom); maverick/undisciplined and out of control
tyrannical abuse (idiom); riding roughshod over people
to oppress/to rule as a despot/to tyrannize
with no regard for law or discipline (idiom); flouting the law and disregarding all rules/in complete disorder
to behave unscrupulously
to stir up trouble
to take advantage of one's position to bully people (idiom)/to kick people around
to take rash action
to prey on the people
to incite trouble/to stir up havoc
variant of 惹是生非[re3 shi4 sheng1 fei1]
to indulge/to connive at
daring/presumptuous/daredevil
